description: This course offers selected surveys in historical studies. Topics depend on instructor. Recent topics have included "Women in Early America," "U.S.-Latin American Relations," and "Doing Public History." May be repeated if topic is different. Offered periodically.
name: Top: The Vikings
notes: Students who have already taken HIST 111 are not permitted to enroll.
The course number for this course has changed to HIST 211.
title: Topics in History
